title: Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles Is Getting A Lavish Collector's Box
description: Preorders for the newly announced remaster of Final Fantasy Tactics are starting to go live. The revamped version of the classic turn-based tactics game is getting a $50 standard physical edition for PS5 and Nintendo Switch. It will be accompanied by a $200 Collector's Box containing a handful of exclusive collectibles, including a detailed Ramza Beoulve figure, a trio of Chocobo plushies, a pop-up diorama, and more. The standard edition and Collector's Box will be available when Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles releases on September 30.At this time, you can only preorder Final Fantasy Tactics directly from the Square Enix Store, but we will update this article if and when that changes.Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles - Collector's Box Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Digimon Story: Time Stranger Release Date, Preorders Bonuses Revealed
description: Digimon Story: Time Stranger $70 | Releases October 3 Preorder at Amazon Preorder at Walmart Preorder at GameStop Digimon Story: Time Stranger Digital Deluxe Edition $100 | Releases October 3 Preorder at PlayStation Store See at Steam Digimon Story: Time Stranger Digital Ultimate Edition $120 | Releases October 3 Preorder at PlayStation Store See at Steam The next entry in the long-running Digimon Story RPG series, Digimon Story: Time Stranger, will launch on PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC on October 3. The game will allow players to recruit and train their own team of digital monsters, using them in turn-based battles while embarking on a time-hopping quest that spans both the real and digital worlds. Multiple versions are available to preorder, including two special digital editions that pack in a season pass and other extra content. Preordering the game ahead of launch will also grant you a few bonuses. Here's all the info on Digimon Story: Time Stranger preorders.Editor's Note: This story was updated on June 4, 2025.Digimon Story: Time Stranger Preorder BonusIf you preorder any version of Digimon Story: Time Stranger, you'll get the following preorder bonuses:Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Everything We Saw During Sony's Big State Of Play
description: Today, Sony held its latest State of Play and while it didn’t include some of the bigger games that people were likely hoping for, like a new God of War spin-off, it did include some cool surprises, including what might be the best-looking fighting game I’ve seen in years and a remake of a beloved Final Fantasy title. Read more...

title: OO7 First Light Reveals Our New Digital James Bond
description: Today, during Sony’s big State of Play, IO Interactive revealed a new trailer for its upcoming James Bond game, 007 First Light. The big news out of the trailer is the first official reveal of the game’s new James Bond, which you can see in the image above. Read more...

title: Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles is remastering the 1997 cult classic later this year
description: It seemed inevitable after the Tactics Ogre remaster back in 2022, and so it was. Square Enix are remastering Final Fantasy Tactics, the classic strategy-RPG from 1997. It'll arrive on September 30th, 2025 and there's a trailer below. Read more
author: Graham Smith
categories: Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles

title: Nioh 3 is coming in 2026, but once again it looks like us PC gamers will have to wait
description: The Nioh games were some of the first non-FromSoft Soulslikes to find their own audience, probably in part because they're not really Soulslikes at all. They're Team Ninja action RPGs, drawn from their wellspring of experience making such games, and despite Nioh's 2017 release date, it spawned from a project that began development all the way back in 2004, firmly pre-Souls. Why all the preamble, rather than getting straight into the news? Well, because the news is in the headline: Nioh 3 was just announced at this evening's State Of Play. Once again it looks like it's coming to PlayStation 5 at launch, with no PC release in sight. Read more
author: Graham Smith

title: Silent Hill f gets fall 2025 release date
description: Silent Hill f will launch on Sept. 25, Konami revealed during Wednesday’s PlayStation State of Play. It’ll be the first new mainline Silent Hill game in over a decade and the first game in the series overall since last year’s Silent Hill 2 Remake. It follows a student, Hinako, in 1960s Japan — a first […]

description: This past Sunday was somewhat instructive when it comes to the state of the invasion of Insmother, the current level of enthusiasm in the Imperium, PanFam’s strategy, and the state of coalitions in null sec and who is willing to work with whom. title: Helm’s Deep After Midnight
description: After messing about outside the fortress, I was directed to the back of Helm’s Deep and told, in low tones, that I really needed to hang out until after midnight before things broke loose.  And, sure enough, back in the back, behind the citadel, there is a table that says… Helm’s Deep, After Midnight. title: Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 881
description: So…what is the Monday Poll? Excellent question! It isn’t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It’s just a list of more or less random questions I’ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007). 1. What time do you usually wake up in the morning? These days, 6 in the morning. Ideally my day would start off at 5:30, though. 2. How organized is your purse? It’s on the verge of haphazard, always, LOL! I mean, I can find the usual things I absolutely need – my phone, wallet, keys, medication, lipgloss. But do I find those things in an efficient manner? No. 3. If you could make one rule that everyone around you had to follow, what would it be? Make your deadlines. I can’t stand it when people are casual about due dates! 4. How do you feel about wearing makeup when it’s hot? I’ll do it, but I don’t like to do too many layers. I’m happy with cream[Continue reading...] The post Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 881 appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.
author: Karen

title: Sundays With Tabs the Cat, Makeup and Beauty Blog Mascot, Vol. 863
description: Tabs always said that in kitty modeling, the best defense is a good offense. If you just rest on your laurels, sooner or later a hungrier up-and-coming cat (or Australian Shepherd) will take what’s yours, and you won’t be walking the catwalk at feline fashion week anymore. Nope, if you’re lucky, you’ll get a page in the Petco catalog. Every once in a while Tabs went into kitty ninja mode, and instead of just patrolling the neighborhood, he conducted more advanced cat recon… He’d inspect the houses on the circle more closely to look for signs of canine or feline incursion. One day, he picked up a new cat’s scent around an air conditioning filter a couple houses down. He sniffed the area for a long time, gathering intelligence, and then used the data to compile a cat profile. According to Tabs, the new cat was a three-year-old male tabby with green eyes and a crooked tail… Moderate kitty modeling potential. Of course, he was added to the database. 🙂 Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict,[Continue reading...] The post Sundays With Tabs the Cat, Makeup and Beauty Blog Mascot, Vol. 863 appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.
author: Karen
